title: Ground News - ‘Rubber’ mountain creature — with ‘cryptic’ looks — found in Peru. It’s a new species
text:
Summary by The News & Observer Researchers discovered the colorful animal “near abandoned farms (or) less frequented roads.” Share menu More

The News & Observer Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: McClatchy ‘Rubber’ mountain creature — with ‘cryptic’ looks — found in Peru. It’s a new species Researchers discovered the colorful animal “near abandoned farms (or) less frequented roads.”
